name: Keto Calculator
author: The Right Software

sections.description:
Keto Calculator, developed by The Right Software web development company, is a simple keto diet calculator, which is used to measure your nutritional needs on a ketogenic diet. It helps users achieve their goal of healing, weight loss, performance and more. Use shortcode [keto_calculator] to show plugin on frontend.

For more info about WordPress plugin development, visit The Right Software plugin development services page.
View other WordPress Plugins.
Send your problems to hello@therightsw.com. Dont forget to mention WordPress and WooCommerce versions.

Features:

  1. Users can enter their information in either Metric or US Customary units.
  2. Calculate results in tabular as well as graphical form.
  3. Provide users both weight loss and weight gain diet plan.
  4. Can be placed on any wordpress page with [keto_calculator] shortcode.

Future Updates:

  1. Options for customizing table and graph styles
  2. Options for customizing result text
  3. Generate PDF reports

1.4

  • Minor Fixes

Support

Visit https://therightsw.com/ for details and enquiries.
sections.installation:
1. Upload (ketocalculator)folder to the /wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place the following short code where you want to display ketocalculator
    shortcode: [keto_calculator]
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release

1.1

  • Layout, responsiveness issues.

1.1.1

  • Added check to enqueue script only on the keto shortcode page.

1.2

  • Added translations for Arabic, Dutch and Finnish.

1.3

  • Added translations for Arabic, Dutch and Finnish for javascript strings.
